name: Hero Run for Buddy Jam 7
description:
<!>NOTICE<!>

This game contains some sequences with flashing effects, as well as mild violent  content and themes that may be unsuitable for some people.

In this platformer game, you have to direct a king through a multi-layered dungeon and other environments. You will find traps, weapons, coins and hostile creatures. The goal in each level is to get out of each room to proceed to the next one. This process is continued until the king is out of the dungeon.

You can use [n] and [p] to go to the next and previous room if it is too hard.

(This game was made for Buddy Jam 7)
